file_content.text: The Rakata secrets will soon belong to the Empire.
Tell me about the Rakata technology. I will give you a count of three. One... two....
My lord, come in. Welcome to the Domination Experiments.
Agent. Perfect timing. Welcome to the Domination Experiments.
Hunter, at last. Welcome to the Domination Experiments.
Come in. Welcome to the Domination Experiments.
The Republic erected this site. The crazed alien inmates here were their test subjects.
Narwotha inside kineesh! Help! Darr tah!
The Rakata technology we seek causes this madness. First it broke the prisoners, then it drove the Republic scientists insane. Such is the power of the Rakata.
Only the feebleminded would succumb to such madness.
Insanity afflicts the weak.
Few are as strong-willed as you and I.
I've always wanted to drive people insane.
Impressive.
My newest captive may interest you.
Imagine the Rakata's ingenuity put to Imperial use.
Soon to be the Empire's power.
I have just the man to realize that vision.
If this tech turns people into lunatics, its recovery will cost you extra.
That wasn't part of our deal.
The payment will match the risk. Now, to business.
How can machinery drive someone insane?
The tech causes madness?
I do not know, but we intend to find out.
Unleashing the Rakata's secrets may poison the galaxy with this madness.
Is releasing such power wise?
Precautions have been taken. The Republic would not be so vigilant.
Meet Doctor Neeya: Republic xenobiologist, overseer of these Domination Experiments.
I discovered the Builders' glory! But you were jealous. Called my tests barbaric. Now look at yourself, drowning in the seas of Lehon!
The Rakata madness poisoned him. Somehow he infected his colleagues. They became cruel shadows of Belsavis's architects.
The Builders chose me. Genius, brilliant they say. To proliferate their magnificence!
I hope you have a reason for keeping this lunatic around.
What use is this madman?
Is someone speaking to you now?
Who are the Builders, doctor?
The Rakata. They showed me the path to their power.
Deranged is more like it.
I am enlightened. The Builders graced me with their knowledge.
Doctor Neeya possesses the Rakata's secrets. He agreed to assist our recovery.
I need my research. But those Republic morons unleashed my test subjects. They're impeding scientific progress!
The Domination Experiments are in chaos. Without order, our mission cannot proceed.
Bring the experiments under control, and Doctor Neeya can lead us to the Rakata technology. Then we will build our second Belsavis.
Trust the madman if you wish, but if he disappoints, it will be your head.
This better work, Commander.
I have complete faith in the doctor, my lord.
I'm going to be very upset if your promises are only mad ravings.
You'd better deliver, doctor.
I speak the truth. The Builders' power will be yours.
Ensure the doctor's true to his word, and I'll reign in these experiments.
I'm trusting you, Commander.
Your trust is well placed, agent.
Crazies don't always hold up their end of the bargain. But either way, I'm getting paid.
Fine. No skin off my back.
Deliver results, hunter. I will ensure the doctor's cooperation.
Can you be more specific?
Visit my camp.
Belsavis will feel my wrath.
They won't know what hit them.
Do what you must.
Confer with our allies. When the Domination Experiment is ours, rendezvous with my strike team. They will prep the technology's extraction.
Now go. For the Empire.
I won't ask again. Tell me what you know of the Rakata technology.
